Package org.opencastproject.execute.operation.handler

Class ExecuteOnceWorkflowOperationHandler

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.workflow.api.AbstractWorkflowOperationHandler
org.opencastproject.execute.operation.handler.ExecuteOnceWorkflowOperationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationHandler
public class ExecuteOnceWorkflowOperationHandler extends org.opencastproject.workflow.api.AbstractWorkflowOperationHandler
Runs an operation once with using elements within a certain MediaPackage as parameters

  • Nested Class Summary
